Instance Method# clamp(lowerBound:upperBound:)

iOS 8.0+iPadOS 8.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.10+tvOS 9.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 2.0+

```
mutating func clamp(
    lowerBound: Self,
    upperBound: Self
)
```

Available when `Scalar` conforms to `Comparable`.
